long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
easyinfo was designed for you to have a one stop shop for all of your easy information. 

With a click of a button you can access the current time, weather and location. 

Also hover over the top-right tab to:
- Choose between 24 hour or 12 hour time
- Select Celsius or Fahrenheit temperature measurement
- Edit the name of your location 

Plus enjoy the scenery of a new NASA image every day as the background, Pulled directly from the NASA databse.

Enjoy!
